pullRequest.title: Added well-known OpenId auto configuration to the SSO generic-provider
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added automatic retrieval of the required OpenID URIs through the use of the well-known OpenID configuration document (see here for further information).
Related Issue
This PR fixes/closes #3044
Description of the solution adopted
The SSO generic-provider now reads the well-known configuration document provided by the OpenID Provider and configures the URIs consequently. If it is not able to configure one of the URIs using the well-known, it tries to read the related property (provided by the user).
Screenshots
N/A
Any side note on the changes made
The sso.md dcoumentation file has been updated accordingly.
